data.name: SCP: New Operative
data.detailed_description:
SCP: New Operative is a multiplayer horror game, in based on SCP: Containment Breach by Undertow Games.
The Unity Engine was used to give better stability and more visuals. As yet being at the beta stage, the game can contain a few bugs and issues which are usually found by our beta testing team and then fixed by the Developers.

It is a totally free horror game based on the SCP Foundation creepypasta series. The Foundation centers around safeguarding the world from any anomaly, item or phenomenon which surpasses the idea of ordinary.

The underground facility experiences a containment breach from different SCP objects which escape their containment. During this breach, players are given tasks to carry out:

  • Class-D Personnel: Expendable personnel used to handle extremely hazardous anomalies, upon the breach, they try to escape the facility.
  • Mobile Task Force: Elite special forces trained to deal the containment breaches.
  • Scientist Personnel: Researchers for the SCP Foundation, upon the breach, they will try to escape.
  • SCP Objects: Anomalies that will try to kill everything in sight.
  • Chaos Insurgency: Foundation traitors, trying to help Class D to escape in order to obtain helpful information.
Other roles are explained In-Game.

data.short_description: SCP: New Operative is a multiplayer action horror game based on the SCP Foundation Wiki. Influence the events of the area wide containment breach at an arctic facility operated under the SCP Foundation.

English*, Dutch, Polish, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
